content: s 3sc in the next st single_crochet in each of next 3st s * repeat around slip_stitch 32 5 back loop only ch1 single_crochet in each st slip_stitch 32 6 -11 ch1 single_crochet in each st slip_stitch 32 12 back loop only ch1 *single_crochet in each of next 4 st s sc3tog single_crochet in the next st* repeat around slip_stitch 24 13 ch1 *single_crochet in each of next 2 st s sc3tog single_crochet in the next* repeat around slip_stitch 16 stuff a present stuff just a little bit to keep the shape 14 ch1 *sc3tog single_crochet* repeat around slip_stitch 8 fasten_off using a needle weave the tail through the front loops of the last 6 st s pull tightly and close the opening weave in loose end ribbon ch90 wrap around tie a knot weave in loose ends tree crown work in continuous spiral in back loop only start with magic_ring 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 6 2 *single_crochet increase* repeat around 9 3 single_crochet in each st around 9 4 *single_crochet single_crochet increase* repeat around 12 5 single_crochet in each st around 12 6 *single_crochet in each of next 3 st s increase* repeat around 15 7 single_crochet in each st around 15 8 *single_crochet in each of next 4 st s increase* repeat around 18 9 single_crochet in each st around 18 10 *single_crochet in each of next 5 st s increase* repeat around 21 11 single_crochet in each st around 21 12 *single_crochet in each of next 6st s increase* repeat around 24 13 single_crochet in each st around 24 14 make 23 slip_stitch s around don t fasten_off turn crochet upwards in the front loops in spiral ch2 slip_stitch back slip_stitch in each of next 3 st s ch2 slip_stitch back slip_stitch in each of next 3 st s ch2 slip_stitch back……… continue till the tree top make less slip_stitch s between branches so closer to the tree top you have tree branches just 1 slip_stitch apart fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing christmas mice santa s sleigh pattern by uljana semikrasa treble_crochet trinkets 2014 type text page 8 tree trunk each round starts with a chain ends with a slip_stitch start with magic_ring in green 1 6sc into magic_ring slip_stitch 6 2 ch1 2sc in each st around slip_stitch 12 3 ch1 *single_crochet 2sc* repeat around slip_stitch 18 4 ch1 *increase single_crochet in each of next 2 st s * repeat around slip_stitch 24 5 back loop only ch1 single_crochet in each st around slip_stitch 24 6 ch1 *decrease single_crochet in each of next 2 st s * repeat around slip_stitch 18 7 ch1 *decrease single_crochet in next st* repeat around slip_stitch 12 change colour brown 8 ch1 decrease around slip_stitch 6 9 -21 ch1 single_crochet in each st slip_stitch 6 fasten_off insert a pipe cleaner in the trunk push and bend it in the root area sew tree crown and tree trunk together for a shorter/longer tree make less or more rounds in trunk
